name: Compatiblizr
author: C. Topham

sections.description: IE 7 and 8 don’t do CSS3 or Media queries so instead of adding the fixes to your theme you can add them via a plugin. This means when they finally die a death you can drop support without having to update your theme. This also covers purchased themes so you don’t need to alter the actual files.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the compatiblizr folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Check the options that you would like to include in Settings > Compatiblizr
sections.changelog:
0.4

  • Fixed options errors

0.3

  • Fixed PHP error

0.2

  • Plugin built and assets added.

short_description: Plugin for patching old versions of IE (7 and 8)to work with CSS3 selectors and Media Queries.
description: IE 7 and 8 don’t do CSS3 or Media queries so instead of adding the fixes to your theme you can add them via a plugin. This means when they finally die a death you can drop support without having to update your theme. This also covers purchased themes so you don’t need to alter the actual files.
